name: 6CVentures
slogan: Early stage venture capital firm dedicated to doing things differently
description:
We are Pre-Seed and Seed stage investors and aim to eliminate structural bias caused by over-reliance on introductions at deal sourcing.

We believe in "Applied Venture" and help founders through their startup journey with technology development, product and go-to market strategy, KPI development and introductions to potential customers or investors.

Our team comes from a variety of backgrounds, including entrepreneurs with exits, technologists and researchers. We believe this cognitive diversity enables us to better support our portfolio companies.

team.name: Paul Taylor
team.bioHtml: Entrepreneur. Early Stage Investor. Start Up Advisor. 10+ years' digital.  Sold 6Consulting to Radian6 which was subsequently sold to Salesforce.com.

team.name: Matt Brazil
team.bioHtml: Founder / CEO @6CVentures - Helping early-stage founders with organizational structure, funding, and market intelligence

team.title: CTO and Founding Partner
team.name: Peter Dresslar
team.bioHtml: Freelance CTO @The Story Market and @Greenomy; Prior startups Elevada and Torrey Path. Hands-on tech leader with broad startup experience.

jobs.title: CMO - Partner Level Position
jobs.description:
6CVentures are actively recruiting for Partner level roles, covering multiple disciplines such as Technical/Engineering, Marketing, Revenue, Legal, Regulation, Operations and more.   If you are passionate about startups and have the skill sets and experience to make a difference we want to hear from you.

6CV is a new kind of Venture Capital firm investing in early-stage companies across industries. We are founded by founders, leaders that have been through the fundraising grind themselves.  We are committed to doing VC differently, reducing unnecessary friction and emphasizing active and constructive engagement.

We supply direct experience to give our portfolio companies advantages in market penetration, technology, and further fundraising. In order to engage and begin helping startups as early as possible, we deploy unique industry research and intelligence tools.

**How we operate**

**Investment**
6CVentures typically invests by way of Applied Venture at the very earliest stages, working directly with the startup, helping to build MVP, test the market, gain early signs of traction, before working with them to raise funding via our investment syndicate.

**Aggressive about seeking fits to our thesis**
6CVentures is focused on businesses that meet our investment criteria from a wide range of industries. We will be aggressive about seeking and contacting business that match specific theses we develop.

**Sector agnostic**
Our founders and partners come from a diverse set of backgrounds, giving us interest in a variety of fields. Since our investment criteria tend to focus on business model, team, and timing factors, we are able to consider investments in a broad range of categories.

**Operational support**
6CVentures maintains a pool of operational capacities that can be applied to accelerate portfolio companies through the pre-seed stage. Since market engagement and validation are the ideal tests to promote stage advancement for startups, we commit to actively accelerating company development in order to achieve market exposure.

jobs.title: Venture Scout
jobs.description:
You're the kind of person that actually knows the organizers at all the local startup events. You enter (and compete!) in hackathons, even though you "don't really code", and you know the pros and cons of every WeWork in town (oof, watch out for the bathrooms on the 19th floor.) You quietly hope for Elon Musk to keep his shit together this week, every week.

ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥

If some or all of this describes you: 6CVentures has a way to turn that passion for startups into practical experience and a dash of cold hard cash. This role is a great way for professionals aspiring to a career in Venture Capital to network, gain experience, and grow their own track record in the industry.

6CVentures is an innovative new Venture Capital firm based in London. Built and led by founders, 6CVentures is focused on making the VC experience more constructive and less time-consuming for founders aspiring startups. From an innovative pitch-free onboarding process to constructive advice to active assistance in syndicated and follow-on funding, we aim to take every aspect of engagement with our portfolio companies and add value rather than deleting it.

Reporting to the Partners at the firm, Regional Scouts play an important role in generating dealflow, identifying industry signals, and generally connecting the firm with local and regional zeitgeist (as well as trends in industries of interest.) As part of the Program, Scouts identify new startups for 6CVentures to screen and potentially onboard. They also participate in regular meetings (up to 1 hour/week), the corporate Slack, and in regional face-to-face meetings from time to time. We frequently communicate with Scouts to get their feelings about a local ecosystem or a space with which we know they are familiar.

Compensation from the role is entirely incentive based and can range from a pleasant bump in the wallet to a reasonable second income depending on participation. More substantial payment would arise in the case of the generation of a major success for the firm. There are also annual contests for prizes, and, of course, the in-house leaderboard. Additional consulting and EIR-related opportunities may also arise from time to time. And, importantly, along the way you'll truly get a look at the way we operate and process investor funds into operational startups, with the chance to become intimately familiar with dealflow, deal parameters, investment theses, and more.

We anticipate that the amount of work involved will range from 1-4 hours a week. Most of our Scouts work "day" jobs (including startups of their own), consult on their own, or are Masters or PhD students. Besides the enthusiasm we allude to above, applicants should have a referenceable background in startups, entrepreneurship, open source software communities, or scientific communities in which we might be able to leverage connections and expertise to find and understand new opportunities.

6CVentures is committed to pursuing a diversity strategy, and we are very interested to work with people from varied backgrounds and walks of life as we grow the firm.
